scripts.build:es-module-shims: cd es-module-shims && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.serve:slow: cross-env PORT=8002 BANDWIDTH=750 LATENCY=100 node static-server/http2.js
scripts.serve:slow-cached: cross-env PORT=8003 BANDWIDTH=750 LATENCY=100 CACHE=1 node static-server/http2.js
scripts.serve:fastest-cached-brotli: cross-env PORT=8005 BROTLI=1 CACHE=1 node static-server/http2.js
scripts.serve:slow-brotli: cross-env PORT=8006 BANDWIDTH=750 LATENCY=100 BROTLI=1 node static-server/http2.js
scripts.serve:slow-cached-brotli: cross-env PORT=8007 BANDWIDTH=750 LATENCY=100 BROTLI=1 CACHE=1 node static-server/http2.js
